info.description:
You are Ryan, A 18-year old boy who's just reached sexual maturity. This series follows your exploits into the sexual universe.

This story is the first in an anthology. Katie is your 17 year old stepsister who has only been living with you for 6 months and Your parents have gone away on a business trip for the weekend.

Rules:
1. Fetishes are welcome; The only ones I would ask to leave out are defacation and urination fetishes
2. No torture (Sorry for any BDSM fans, not that I don't approve just not something I want to read)
3. ABSOLUTELY NO RAPE!!!
4. Being graphic is encouraged but be descriptive. (i.e. He jizzed on her face = With a moan, he came, splashing his sperm on her forehead = )
5. Please keep the story in first person
6. To any gays/lesbians, worry not, I plan on making more stories in this series with gay/lesbian stories.

So please, don't be shy, have fun, and help build a great interactive!
